pane.empty: Select a file from the sidebar to get started

welcome.title: Thank you for installing Stencila!
welcome.explanation: The Stencila desktop application allows you to author, convert, and preview executable documents right on your desktop.

plugins.title: Plugins
plugins.explanation:
Stencila is extensible by plugins to add support for multiple languages and file formats.
We recommend installing the following plugins to get started.

end.title: You’re all set!
end.explanation: You’re now ready to start working on your projects.

resources.info: Here are some helpful resources to get you started:
resources.chat: Chat with the team on Discord

crashReports.label: Send crash reports
crashReports.help:
Help us improve the application by enabling automatic error reporting.
Reports only contain information helpful in reproducing and solving errors, and do not contain any personally identifiable information

newFileDefault.label: Default format
newFileDefault.help: File format to use for newly created files
